### Deliver Exceptional App Performance with Our AI-Powered Mobile Observability Platform
With comprehensive performance monitoring, crash analytics, bug reporting, app ratings and reviews, release management, and session replay, Instabug's AI-powered mobile observability platform helps your team to seamlessly balance innovation and app stability.
[Explore Instabug's Products![Balance Between Performance Improvements and New Features](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62706e0299180d3045eb2cab/62718997e550056a0cd38fbe_arrow-blue.svg)](https://instabug.com/</product>)
### Scale Large Mobile Dev Teams While Enhancing App Security and Maintaining Privacy
Empower your mobile enterprise with Instabug's seamless support, unmatched availability, and robust redundancy solutions. Our mobile-first approach guarantees that as you scale, your privacy and security remain top priorities.
[Explore Instabug's Products![Balance Between Performance Improvements and New Features](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62706e0299180d3045eb2cab/62718997e550056a0cd38fbe_arrow-blue.svg)](https://instabug.com/</product>)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62706e0299180d3045eb2cab/66d593915cc75d02bd99ca31_AI.svg)
### **Unlock Mobile Growth with AI-Driven Insights**
Transform your mobile app development process with AI-powered observability, enabling faster issue resolution, deeper performance insights, and proactive user experience optimization. Drive innovation and scale effortlessly while maintaining app stability and security.

### Protect Your Users and Your Data. Accelerate Your Business With a Secure Solution.
Instabug applies the highest security standards, as well as high availability and redundancy to ensure your data security and maximize business uptime
![SOC2 Compliance](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62706e0299180d3045eb2cab/62709d652398f83ba4172525_icn-shield.svg)
#### SOC2 Compliance
SOC2 Type II attestation and secure hosting on AWS
![User Data Protection](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62706e0299180d3045eb2cab/62709d6512a7a2b538ecf44b_icn-protection.svg)
#### User Data Protection
GDPR compliant ensuring user data privacy and protection
![3rd Party Security Audits](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62706e0299180d3045eb2cab/62709d65e69528e7ed6a909b_icn-audits.svg)
#### 3rd Party Security Audits
Regular third-party penetration tests against applications and APIs
![Data Encryption](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62706e0299180d3045eb2cab/62709d65991bfb7f798a6d53_icn-lock.svg)
#### Data Encryption
Data protection through encryption in transit and at rest
## Support for Multiple Platforms
In less than a minute, integrate the Instabug SDK for iOS, Android, React Native, Xamarin, Cordova, Flutter, and Unity mobile apps
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62706e0299180d3045eb2cab/65678f5eace085edef6032e8_ios.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62706e0299180d3045eb2cab/655e5b6fa33f033ba7b8480a_Android.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62706e0299180d3045eb2cab/655e53053545bdabe4a97117_react.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62706e0299180d3045eb2cab/655e5324ba6b3c6cb076bf51_Flutter.svg)

Instabug.start(
	withToken: "YOUR_APP_TOKEN_HERE", 
invocationEvents: [.shake, .screenshot]
)
```

```
new Instabug.Builder(this, "YOUR_APP_TOKEN_HERE")
.setInvocationEvents(
	InstabugInvocationEvent.SHAKE,
	InstabugInvocationEvent.SCREENSHOT)
.build();
```

[Learn More →](https://instabug.com/</platforms/android>)

import Instabug from'instabug-reactnative';

Instabug.init({
token: 'APP_TOKEN',
invocationEvents: [InvocationEvent.shake],
});

```

generated_description:
### Instabug: Revolutionizing Mobile App Observability

**Overview**  
Instabug is a prominent player in the mobile app development world, offering a platform designed for mobile apps' observability and performance monitoring. Founded during the Y Combinator Batch W16 in 2016, and based in San Francisco, Instabug is helmed by a talented team of around 190 employees. The company's mission? To help developers monitor, prioritize, and debug performance and stability issues throughout the mobile app development lifecycle.

**Product and Services**  
Instabug delivers a robust mobile observability platform that integrates seamlessly into the app development process. Their services include:

- **AI-Powered Mobile Observability**: Enhanced insights for optimizing app performance.
- **Bug and Crash Reporting**: Identify and address critical issues effortlessly.
- **Test and Release Management**: Ensure seamless releases backed by proactive bug detection.
- **User Feedback Collection**: Continuously gather actionable insights to improve app quality.

The platform stands out with its focus on **zero-maintenance apps**, powered by AI, making it easier for developers to deliver high-quality apps without the cumbersome upkeep of manual processes. They boast an impressive integration ecosystem with tools like Jira, GitHub, and Slack, making collaboration smoother than ever.

**Industry Impact**  
Instabug has set a high bar in mobile performance monitoring, recognized as a leader by G2 for its user adoption and customer satisfaction. Over 25,000 mobile teams, including heavyweights like Lyft and Verizon, trust Instabug to provide the insights necessary for maintaining app quality and stability.

**Team and Leadership**  
With Jared Friedman as their Group Partner, Instabug benefits from a wealth of experience and mentorship in the startup ecosystem. Their team culture is geared toward innovation and user-centric empathy, crucial for a tech company at the forefront of mobile app solutions.

**Security and Privacy**  
Instabug takes user security seriously, adhering to top standards including SOC2 compliance and GDPR regulations, promising robust data protection without compromising on service availability.

### Proactive Approach for Developers  
The core of Instabug's strategy is to empower developers with better tools for monitoring and feedback. By making app performance insights available in real-time, they allow teams to focus not just on troubleshooting, but on creating better experiences for users. 

In summary, Instabug isn’t just about fixing problems; it’s about preventing them before they arise, an essential paradigm shift in the app development lifecycle. For anyone serious about mobile development, it’s a partnership worth considering as they push the boundaries of performance monitoring and user experience. 

For more details, explore their offerings at [Instabug](https://instabug.com).
